SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddExtra( FILTER_EXTRA_CREATURE_BLOCKING ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED_ONLY, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then local characteristics = target:GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Power_Add( 7 ) characteristics:Toughness_Add( 7 ) end
